text: 1.10: 2 T 4.18; 2 Pi 2.9Mba simtɨga mbatɨga guareŋra, ne guigira ŋka shogirim, ŋka vhɨzgirga tuktɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme thav taagia ŋka ndigi. Ana vhɨra zumgum mbara muuŋgip taagi ŋka ndigirga. Ŋka khueŋ khothɨga havhargi. Mba bigi mbatɨgi zazera ŋkan farfa saŋv muunga, Fhe Bakɨme taagip ŋka ndigirga, ŋka nzerara kɨrga.
